Wasserportal Berlin: get master data for a multiple stations

Source: R/get_wasserportal_masters_data.R
get_wasserportal_masters_data.Rd

Wasserportal Berlin: get master data for a multiple stations

get_wasserportal_masters_data(station_ids, run_parallel = TRUE)

Arguments

station_ids

station_ids

run_parallel

default: TRUE

Value

data frame with metadata for selected station ids

Examples

station_ids <- 1:4
parallel::detectCores()
#> [1] 3
system.time(get_wasserportal_masters_data(station_ids))
#> Importing 4 station metadata from Wasserportal Berlin ... ok. (6.31s) 
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   0.016   0.010   6.956 
system.time(get_wasserportal_masters_data(station_ids,
                                          run_parallel = FALSE))
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   0.189   0.015   4.619
